channel.title: [Blurr/Delta] Friends/Players on the minimap (How can I edit this?)
channel.description: I've had a lot of ideas that would involve making different colors on the minimap for different players. I have searched around for anything that links the client to your friends list but I am very clueless as to where I would find said properties. If anyone could let me know how/where in the client this is added I would greatly appreciate it.
